``` {r test}

annotate_test <- cnlp_annotate(input = c(
  "Here is the first text. It is short.",
  "Here's the second. It is short too!",
  "The third text is the shortest."))


d <- annotate_test$token

d %>% 
  count(xpos) %>% 
  filter(xpos != ".") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n, xpos)) +
  geom_col()


lapply(annotate_test, head)

```
